page.title: 09Kingsholm Primary Gloucester
page.content: Forest of Dean,rambling in the Cotswolds and a week_long educational visit to the Isle of Wight for the older children. Kingsholm is a Church of England school in the parish of St.Marks church.Canon Lyon,who has been vicar at the church since the school opened, retires this year.He has taken school assembly every Tuesday since the opening and has also been a Governor all that time. When Kingsholm children reach the final year,they are selected, a combination of school assessments and verbal_reasoning test,for one of three types of secondary education:Grammar, Comprehensive or Secondary Modern Schools,this means that Kingsholm children are separated into many different schools.In 1985 50 children move on to 9 different schools.
